sentences.en: Annie and her brother were sent to an orphanage.
sentences.cn: 安妮和她弟弟被送进了孤儿院.

sentences.en: Chiefly British A charitable institution, such as an orphanage or home elderly.
sentences.cn: 收容所,养老院:一种慈善机构, 例如孤儿院或老年收容所.

sentences.en: He is an orphan and grew up in a orphanage.
sentences.cn: 他是个孤哀子,从小长在孤儿院.

sentences.en: He was raised in an orphanage.
sentences.cn: 他是在孤儿院里长大的。

sentences.en: His early orphanage shaped his character as an adult.
sentences.cn: 他童年的孤儿经历塑造了他成熟的性格.

sentences.en: I've been chopping wood at the orphanage a long time.
sentences.cn: 我在孤儿院劈了好一阵了. ”

sentences.en: Mr. and Mr. Brown adopted a baby in an orphanage.
sentences.cn: 伯朗夫妻在一家孤儿院领养了一名婴儿.

sentences.en: Natasha attached herself to the film crew filming at her orphanage.
sentences.cn: 娜塔莎紧紧缠着在孤儿院拍摄电影的工作人员不放。

sentences.en: She was brought up in an orphanage after her parents died.
sentences.cn: 她的父母去世后,她是在孤儿院里被带大的.

sentences.en: The best part was when David was sent to an orphanage.
sentences.cn: 最精彩的部分是大卫被送进孤儿院是时候.

sentences.en: The conference was of benefit to orphanage directors and adoptive parents alike.
sentences.cn: 这一研讨会对孤儿院院长和收养孩子的父母都十分有益.

sentences.en: The orphanage is high in the Carolina mountains.
sentences.cn: 在卡罗来纳的山地里,有一座孤儿院坐落在高处.

sentences.en: They dispensed new clothes to the children in the orphanage.
sentences.cn: 他们把新衣服发给孤儿院的小孩们.

sentences.en: They gave the proceeds of the sale to the orphanage.
sentences.cn: 他们把销售的收入给了这家孤儿院.
这所孤儿院有许多施主.

sentences.en: This orphanage solicits its benevolence of the wealthy people.
sentences.cn: 这所孤儿院恳求富人的善心.

words.tran_cn: 孤儿；孤儿状态；孤儿的身份

trans.tran_en: a large house where children who are orphans live and are taken care of
